verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus,
Sweetest name I know,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Fills my ev'ry longing,
Keeps me singing as I go.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There's within my heart
a melody.
Jesus whispers
sweet and low:

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
"Fear not, I am with thee;
peace, be still,"
In all of life's
ebb and flow.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
All my life was wrecked
by sin and strife;
Discord filled my heart
with pain.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Jesus swept across
the broken strings,
Stirred the slumb'ring
chords again.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Feasting on the riches
of His grace,
Resting 'neath
His shelt'ring wing,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Always looking on
His smiling face,
That is why
I shout and sing.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Tho' sometimes He leads
thro' waters deep,
Trials fall across
my way,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Tho' sometimes the path
seems rough and steep,
See His footprints
all the way.

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Soon He's coming back
to welcome me
Far beyond
the starry sky.

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
I shall wing my flight
to worlds unknown;
I shall reign with Him
on high.
